moves.14. Qh5:
A checkmate appears in f7.........
Now here are the following list of conditional moves which ensure his doom

• 14. ... Ke7 15. Qxf7  Kd6 16. Qxb7 
• 14. ... Bxg5 15. fxg5 g6 16. Bxg6 
• 14. ... Re7 15. Bg6 
• 14. ... g6 15. Bxg6 fxg6 16. Qxg6 Re7 17. Nh7  Rxh7 18. Qxh7
